epiphania city thinly inhabited upper cilicia likewise sent dima achaia thus war pyrates men thought would long ended day pompey seventy two ship taken three hundred yielded sixscore tower fort others place retreat ten thousand slain stood upon defence expeditious victory success exceeded men hope senate people rome acknowledgement great service done pompey conferred signal honor gave commission called great thing else general left little war pompey assembled force asia went encamped frontier mithridates estate present gallant army composed thirty thousand foot three thousand horse chosen men raised upon land defence kingdom lucullus long spoiled country victual still scarce made many mithridates soldier run roman army though king inflicted cruel punishment upon surprised attempt throwing headlong rock squeezing others eye burning alive fear kept many duty yet army little little wast reason scarcity occasioned sending ambassador pompey demand upon condition might peace roman answered delivering runaway yielding discretion king reported answer revolters seeing terrified swore never would peace roman cruelty would consent thing common good done service whereupon pompey laid party horse ambush sent rest skirmish mithridates camp order give ground first charge surprised fear till time drawn enemy ambush charged together indeed roman put rout might possibly entred camp rear fled mithridates fearing disorder drawn foot placed order camp forced retreat first engagement horse two party length king oppressed want provision returned heart kingdom hope enemy could subsist ruined country least without much inconveniency pompey presently discamped bringing provision along marched far eastern part kingdom caused line drawn 〈…〉 one hundred fifty furlong length fortified many fort inclose king cut passage fetch corn forrage mithridates gave hindrance work either fear imprudence ordinarily precedes calamity soon found reduced want forced kill beast burthen sustain army keeping horse service infinite trouble made shift subsist thus fifty day afterwards great silence made escape night difficult way morrow pompey overtaking fell upon rearguard king notwithstanding counsel
